1.0.0.name: connect20/Cp_Dog
1.0.0.description: Watchdog is a free Magento extension (Community + Enterprise) that generates a daily email sales summary for your Magento stores.  Watchdog also has trigger-based alerts, that will alert you via if sales spike or drop on your site, or if your site has critical errors.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
